titles.title: Recognizing the 100th anniversary of the formation of the California Almond Growers Exchange, a cooperative to market almonds produced by members of the cooperative.
Recognizing the 100th anniversary of the formation of the California Almond Growers Exchange, a cooperative to market almonds produced by members of the cooperative.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: Recognizes the California Almond Growers Exchange for its 100 years of leadership in developing and promoting the California almond industry both domestically and worldwide.
